data.text:
That's it over there. That island is 
home to the Mejiro Family's villa.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
That island's full of villas! You know what that means, we can 
dig up some treasure under there!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: Please do not destroy the island!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
The members of Team Sirius decided to host a training 
camp during their summer vacation.

Since it was for the team, Mejiro McQueen allowed us to use the 
Mejiro Family's villa. However…

Yahoo!! This island's entirely deserted! Now 
we can have as much fun as we want!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: Jeez, we didn't come here to mess around you know.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: I guess she can't help but get excited…

choices.text: Since it's the first day, let's just take it easy.
choices.processed: <size=37>Since it's the first day, let's just take it easy.</size>

choices.text: Since it's the first day, let's just take it easy.
choices.processed: <size=37>Since it's the first day, let's just take it easy.</size>

data.text: Haa… Trainer-san, even you're saying things like that?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Hey, is it really okay for us to have come along? 
We aren't a part of your team after all…
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: McQueen and Trainer-san invited us, so it won't be a problem!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
I figured it would be more fun if more people tagged 
along, so you're both more than welcome.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
I figured it would be more fun if more people tagged 
along, so you're both more than welcome.
data.name: <username>

data.text: Thank you very much!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
And thus began the start of Team Sirius' training camp, including 
two members of the Mejiro Family.
Okay everyone, let's do one more lap!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: McQueen, if you don't pick up the pace I'm going to overtake you!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text: Huh!? It's my job to lead the way though!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Hey now, Dober, you need to pick up the pace too!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
B-But I can't really focus on running 
right now… everyone's staring…
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Dober, there's nothing to worry about! 
You're really cute after all!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
P-Please don't try and compliment me! I know 
better than anyone else that I'm not cute!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: Gold Ship-san! What on Earth are you doing!?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
When training at the beach you've gotta 
dress the part, doncha think?
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
We don't often get to train at the beach so this 
is the perfect time for some intense training!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: All I can see is that you're trying to do some intense playing!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: All right, it's time for me to accelerate!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text: W-Wait up! You're running too fast!!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Haa… Haa… Haa…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
I think we may have gone a bit too hard. 
It is only the first day after all.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
That being said, McQueen is truly amazing, isn't she? She managed 
to keep up with your sudden spurt easily.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
I can't lose to Ryan again. She already beat 
me in the Takarazuka Kinen after all.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
For context, prior to this summer camp Mejiro McQueen came into 
the Takarazuka Kinen, the race that closes off the first half of 
the year, as the most likely to win.

However, she was unable to fend off Mejiro 
Ryan and ended up coming in second.

McQueen's running never ceases to amaze me! Whether 
it be during training or during races!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

data.text: Well she is the reason we joined this team～
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl

data.text: Ugh… How long is this going to last?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
There's a reason that they love you so much. It's 
something you can be proud of, you know?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
That's right, you're truly incredible. It makes 
me so happy when people praise you.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
Okay then, I'm going to go for another run so I can make sure to 
defeat the super popular McQueen once again!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text: Ah, don't go on without me! I'm going for a run too!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
The sun began to set, and that's when we realized just how late 
it had gotten. Time truly flies when one is having fun.

Is everything alright? Everyone's already 
headed back to the villa.
data.name: <username>

data.text: Ah… I'm fine. I was just thinking about our team's members.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Just a little while ago we were a shell of our 
former selves, but now we have new members.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
They all saw how I ran, and that made 
them want to run alongside me.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
They were all moved by you. Just like 
we were moved by Oguri's race.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
They were all moved by you. Just like 
we were moved by Oguri's race.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
When I think about it I get mixed feelings. 
On one hand I'm incredibly proud, but on the 
other hand it's quite embarrassing.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
We were able to win the Spring Tenno Sho 
and preserve the team, however…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Trainer-san, there is still something that I need to do.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
I need to continue running so as not to betray the 
expectations that everyone else has of me.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
The expression on Mejiro McQueen's face, which was smiling yet 
exuding confidence, reassured me.
Of course, you can count on me.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
